divs: Sighting DetailsWas in back yard after rain storm most of the day when I looked up saw two pulsating light spheres or a greenish whiter light making circular patterns. I called my son out to observe make sure I was seeing what I was seeing. We both witnessed the ufo���s and they kept making a circular pattern over the downtown area of Beverly, we also witness three commercial airlines since we are not far from the approach to Logan Airport in Boston. Those plans you could make out until the disappeared into the cloud cover and could hear their engines. These object were silent and appeared to be in the cloud cover, as I write this they are still in their circular pattern
Summary: {nd} Was in back yard after rain storm most of the day when I looked up say two pulsating light spheres or a greenish whiter light making circular patterns
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Beverly
There were no other sightings in Beverly on or around July 23rd 2013
